lead_paragraph: A former corrections officer who said he knew Mr. Doig filed the lawsuit, saying the painter’s denials blew up a plan to sell the work for millions of dollars.

headline.print_headline: You Didn’t Paint This? Prove It
headline.main: Peter Doig Says He Didn’t Paint This. Now He Has to Prove It.

snippet: A former corrections officer who said he knew Mr. Doig filed the lawsuit, saying the painter’s denials blew up a plan to sell the work for millions of dollars....
abstract: Artist Peter Doig is being sued by Robert Fletcher, Canadian former corrections officer who claims he owns painting Doig made as incarcerated teenager, but which Doig disowns; experts say case is unique example of artist being forced to prove work's inauthenticity, and could leave other artists vulnerable to similar claims.
